Respond to an emailFrom: update@dailyjobseeker.comTo: Anna BillingsSubject: Daily Jobseeker updateSent: March 14, 20—Dear Daily Jobseeker subscriber,Here is the most recent job opening:Marleyhome Inc. is looking for an experienced accountant to fill a vacancy in its Accounting Department. The company needs someone with an accounting degree and at least three years of experience. Contact Ralph Kramer, r_kramer@marleyhome.com. Directions: Respond to the e-mail as if you are interested in applying for the position. Make ONE statement about your professional background and TWO requests for information about the job.

emailDetails.subject: Daily Jobseeker update
emailDetails.content: Dear Daily Jobseeker subscriber,Here is the most recent job opening:Marleyhome Inc. is looking for an experienced accountant to fill a vacancy in its Accounting Department. The company needs someone with an accounting degree and at least three years of experience. Contact Ralph Kramer, r_kramer@marleyhome.com. Directions: Respond to the e-mail as if you are interested in applying for the position. Make ONE statement about your professional background and TWO requests for information about the job.

questions.context: Respond to an emailFrom: Elisa Hays, Front Desk Supervisor To: Front desk agents, Hotel Mediterraneo Subject: Reservation systemSent: December 1, 20—It has come to my attention that several of you have experienced problems with the reservation system recently. In order to address these problems, we need to compile a complete list of the issues that each of you have encountered. Please send me this list at your earliest convenience. Sincerely,Elisa HaysFront Desk Supervisor Directions: Respond to the e-mail as if you are a front desk agent at Hotel Mediterraneo. In your e-mail, describe THREE problems with the reservation system.

emailDetails.subject: Reservation system
emailDetails.content: It has come to my attention that several of you have experienced problems with the reservation system recently. In order to address these problems, we need to compile a complete list of the issues that each of you have encountered. Please send me this list at your earliest convenience. Sincerely,Elisa HaysFront Desk Supervisor Directions: Respond to the e-mail as if you are a front desk agent at Hotel Mediterraneo. In your e-mail, describe THREE problems with the reservation system.

questions.context: Many people enjoy spending time playing and watching sports. Why do you think sports are important to people? Give specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
